Name: Sound Shift
About the game: Sound Shift is a VJ style music visualiser mixed with a simple arcade shooter. Shoot targets to earn credits which can be spent to unlock new videos and FX. Music is streamed directly from your computer's audio output, so you can use sound from any source including on-line streaming services.
Meta Title: Sound Shift: Aug 26, 2015, Matthew Brown and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Sound Shift? Check out the release date (Aug 26, 2015), developer insights from Matthew Brown, and a complete game summary.
